pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable, Diversity and Joining Sequences from Various Species // Contains variable, diversity, and joining sequences and accompanying functions that enable both the extraction of and comparison between immune V-D-J genomic segments from a variety of species. Sources include IMGT from MP Lefranc (2009) doi:10.1093/nar/gkn838 and Vgenerepertoire from publication DN Olivieri (2014) doi:10.1007/s00251-014-0784-3.
